response.overview: A thrilling reimagining of the classic time-travel adventure, this short film brings a fresh twist to the beloved Back to the Future story. When a young inventor accidentally activates a homemade time machine, they find themselves racing against time to fix the past before it changes the future forever. Packed with nostalgia, high-energy sequences, and a dash of humor, this tribute captures the spirit of the original in a compact and exciting new way.
response.title: Aftur til Framtíðarinnar
